title: Please, I'll Leave Soon
body:
Yasuo


All normal games



Just freaking Yasuos everywhere
I've been playing Zed all afternoon cause he's pretty fun, and play 7-8 games. lost 5 of them, with Yasuo's in 5-6 games.
He is honestly just no skill. His shield is so Overpowered it's just stupid.
I try to poke him _eg_  Zed W and E him to get some damage in.
shield blocks the E and he doesn't lose any health.
even if I Q him after that, his lifesteal just gives it back anyway.
Please.
All my games I'm tilted cause of Yasuo in every single game.
People say he's a very skillful champion.
He's so easy. People that are legitimate level 7's play him (And they're not smurfs and i'm sure)
and get freaking 40000000000000000/0/1432153567.
If RIOT doesn't find a way to change this FAST
I'm quitting.

(I wanted to keep this G rated, as i could've swore a million times, but RIOT won't respond then)

replies.body: Go play some games on Yasuo, then come back to tell us he's no skill.
I totally agree. Yasuo gets camped hard by enemy jungler. He is very weak against hard engage, high cc team comps and takes a fair amount of skill to play with out feeding the enemy laner/team.
You gotta be seriously weak if you're quitting due to one champion being strong...he's already received nerfs and I doubt they're his last

So, that argument is silly, I dont paly yas, but im pretty sure yas is a hard match up against yas anyway. he has a low skill floor, but i very high skill ceiling. he is also dynamically fun to play. i do admit his shield should regen while in combat, but other than that he is fine.
